revised_title: The Accurate Determination of Carbonic Acid and Moisture in Air: A Study on the Spectrum of the Great Nebula in Orion
tldr: This article discusses the accurate determination of carbonic acid and moisture in the air, as well as the spectrum of the Great Nebula in Orion. The authors present their findings on the association between the aurora line, manganese fluting, and the spectra of meteor-swarms and meteorites.
